statements: SELECT * FROM player_profiles;
SELECT id, username FROM player_profiles WHERE id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT * FROM player_profiles WHERE username = 'john_doe';
SELECT id, username, stats->>'level' AS level FROM player_profiles WHERE stats->>'level' >= '10';
SELECT id, username, achievements->>'special_achievement' AS special_achievement FROM player_profiles WHERE achievements->>'special_achievement' IS NOT NULL;
SELECT * FROM player_profiles WHERE id = 'e3df9f04-8c6e-4a5e-b52a-aec45b29299e'
SELECT id, username FROM player_profiles WHERE username LIKE 'J%' ORDER BY username ASC
SELECT id, username, stats -> 'level' as player_level FROM player_profiles WHERE stats -> 'level' > 50 ORDER BY stats -> 'level' DESC

SELECT id, username, achievements -> 'completion_date' as last_achievement_date FROM player_profiles WHERE achievements -> 'completion_date' IS NOT NULL ORDER BY achievements -> 'completion_date' DESC

SELECT id, username, stats -> 'kills' as total_kills, stats -> 'deaths' as total_deaths, stats -> 'wins' as total_wins FROM player_profiles WHERE stats -> 'wins' > stats -> 'kills' AND stats -> 'kills' > stats -> 'deaths' AND stats -> 'deaths' > 0 ORDER BY stats -> 'wins' DESC, stats -> 'kills' ASC
SELECT id, username FROM player_profiles;
SELECT id, username, stats->'level' as player_level, stats->'experience' as player_experience FROM player_profiles;
SELECT id, username, achievements FROM player_profiles WHERE username = 'john_doe';
SELECT * FROM player_stats WHERE level > 10 ORDER BY wins DESC;
SELECT id, experience FROM player_stats WHERE player_id = 123;
SELECT username, stats->'level' AS player_level, stats->'experience' AS player_experience FROM player_profiles WHERE id = 1;
SELECT username, stats->'wins' AS player_wins, stats->'losses' AS player_losses FROM player_profiles WHERE stats->'level' > 10;
SELECT username, stats->'level' AS player_level, stats->'experience' AS player_experience FROM player_profiles WHERE stats->'level' < 5 AND achievements @> '[{"type": "beginner"}]';
SELECT username, stats->'wins' AS player_wins, stats->'losses' AS player_losses FROM player_profiles WHERE stats->'wins' > stats->'losses';
SELECT username, stats->'level' AS player_level, stats->'experience' AS player_experience, achievements FROM player_profiles WHERE stats->'level' >= 20 AND achievements @> '[{"type": "completed"}]';
SELECT * FROM player_profiles
SELECT username, stats FROM player_profiles WHERE username = 'JohnDoe'
SELECT * FROM player_stats ORDER BY level DESC
SELECT username, level, points FROM player_stats WHERE points > 100
SELECT achievement_name, description FROM player_achievements
SELECT * FROM player_profiles WHERE username='john_doe';
SELECT username, stats->>'score' AS score FROM player_profiles WHERE username='jane_smith';
SELECT username, level, points FROM player_stats WHERE level > 10 ORDER BY points DESC;
SELECT username, achievement_name, description FROM player_profiles JOIN player_achievements ON player_profiles.achievements = player_achievements.achievement_id;
SELECT DISTINCT username FROM player_stats WHERE points > 100;
SELECT * FROM player_profiles;
SELECT player_id, username FROM player_profiles ORDER BY player_id DESC;
SELECT player_id, email FROM player_profiles WHERE email LIKE '%gmail.com%';
SELECT * FROM player_stats WHERE wins > losses ORDER BY wins DESC;
SELECT player_id, achievement_name, date_achieved FROM player_achievements ORDER BY date_achieved ASC;
SELECT * FROM player_profiles;
SELECT username, email FROM player_profiles WHERE player_id = 1;
SELECT player_id, wins, losses FROM player_stats WHERE wins > losses;
SELECT player_id, achievement_name, date_achieved FROM player_achievements ORDER BY date_achieved DESC;
SELECT player_id1, player_id2, friend_since FROM player_friends WHERE friend_since BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';
SELECT * FROM player_profiles;
SELECT id, username FROM player_profiles WHERE join_date < '2022-01-01';
SELECT id, email FROM player_profiles WHERE id = 1;
SELECT player_id, games_played FROM player_stats ORDER BY games_played DESC;
SELECT id, achievement_name, date_achieved FROM player_achievements WHERE date_achieved >= '2021-01-01' ORDER BY date_achieved ASC;
SELECT * FROM player_profiles WHERE id = 1;
SELECT username, email FROM player_profiles WHERE join_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT id, player_id, total_score FROM player_stats ORDER BY total_score DESC;
SELECT player_id, achievement_name FROM player_achievements WHERE date_achieved BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';
SELECT sender_id, recipient_id, message_text FROM messages WHERE date_sent < NOW() ORDER BY date_sent DESC;
